title: WATCH: How to recreate Demi-Leigh’s basic brow look in five easy steps
text:
Demi-Leigh Nel-Peters (24) has let her Instagram followers in on how to achieve her basic brow look in two minutes.

The former Miss SA and Miss Universe, who’s of course no stranger to extravagant beauty looks, shared a five-step crash course on how she achieves her daily basic brow look in a post she shared on Instagram.

In the short clip, Demi, who’s engaged to American baseball player Tim Tebow (32), stands in front of a bathroom mirror in a robe demonstrating the five steps to her basic brows.

READ MORE: Zendaya’s makeup artist shares how the star achieves her red carpet looks

All you need to ace this look are five makeup tools: a brush, brow pencil, angle brush, powder and brow mascara.

“Step 1: brush. Step 2: brow pencil. Step 3: angle brush and powder. Step 4: brow mascara (this sets the brow). Step 5: clean the edges,” she captioned the video.

Check out how to master Demi’s basic brow below.





Source: Instagram
description: Demi-Leigh Nel-Peters (24) has let her Instagram followers in on how to achieve her basic brow look in two minutes.
